typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Año} as integer,
		Mes as integer,
		{Region ID} as integer,
		Target as decimal(18,5)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ExtTargetTable
source(output(
		num_order as string,
		fec_orden as date,
		fec_envio as date,
		modo_envio as string,
		cliente_id as string,
		imp_subtotal as double,
		region_id as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ExtDetalleOrdenes
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	validationMode: 'none',
	namespaces: true) ~> ExtModoEnvio
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	validationMode: 'none',
	namespaces: true) ~> source2
source(output(
		{Region ID} as string,
		{Region Desc} as string,
		{Detalle region} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source3
ExtTargetTable keyGenerate(output(PK_Metas as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> AgregarSurrogateKey
Join2, ExtModoEnvio join(ERROR_FUNCTION('') == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join3, source2 join(ERROR_FUNCTION('') == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join2
ExtDetalleOrdenes, source3 join(ERROR_FUNCTION('') == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join3
Join1 keyGenerate(output(PKOrder as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
SurrogateKey1 select(mapColumn(
		num_order,
		fec_orden,
		fec_envio,
		modo_envio,
		cliente_id,
		region_id,
		{Region ID},
		{Region Desc},
		{Detalle region},
		PKOrder
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
AgregarSurrogateKey sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		PK_Meta as integer,
		{Año} as integer,
		Mes as integer,
		Region_ID as integer,
		TARGET as decimal(18,5)
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	preSQLs:['Truncate Table DIM_Metas'],
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		PK_Meta = PK_Metas,
		{Año},
		Mes,
		Region_ID = {Region ID},
		TARGET = Target
	)) ~> AlmacenarMetasDWH
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		num_order as string,
		OrderId as string,
		fec_orden as date,
		fec_envio as date,
		imp_subtotal as double,
		id_modo as integer,
		modo_envio as string,
		ID_Tipo_envio as integer,
		descripcion_envio as string,
		Region_ID as integer,
		Region_descripcion as string,
		Detalle_Region as string,
		Codigo as integer
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		num_order,
		fec_orden,
		fec_envio,
		modo_envio,
		Region_ID = region_id
	)) ~> sink1
